name: tm55
effect: Teaches Brine to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Scald to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Brine)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.
